description: We serve the way we make it!This Fintie 360 Degrees Rotating Case Cover for iPad is a must have a perfect companion for an easy and enjoying life. It is designed with functionality and visual elegance in mind, this case is not typical. The case was designed in with duel layer protection, with hard plastic interior molding that fits perfectly to the back of iPad and premium quality synthetic leather in the exterior. The interior hard cover allows your iPad to be rotated 360 degree horizontally and vertically. This case was also uniquely designed to provide user various viewing and typing angles in BOTH horizontal and vertical view, something a typical cover cannot provide.All features of the iPad are accessible even with the case on.Other Style cases for iPad 2/3/4 offered by Fintie:1. Folio Case: B0091DF9CG2. Ultra Slim Case: B009Z7VLTS3. Kiddie Case: B005GIEB0GPLEASE NOTE:Colors shown in pictures may slightly differ from actual product due to lighting and color settings.
title: Fintie Apple iPad 2/3/4 Case - 360 Degree Rotating Stand Smart Case Cover for iPad with Retina Display (iPad 4th Generation), the new iPad 3 & iPad 2 (Automatic Wake/Sleep Feature) - Black
